1.content: Update subscription system to enforce per-subject free limits
1.details: Modify useSubscription hook to track 20 free questions per subject instead of 25 total questions across all subjects. Update logic to check per-subject limits and block access when exceeded.

2.details: Modify components to display per-subject question limits and remaining counts. Show which specific subject has reached its limit.

3.details: Verify that all practice features are completely blocked when free limits are exceeded, requiring subscription to continue.

4.content: Test and deploy the updated subscription limits
4.details: Build and deploy the updated app with new per-subject limits, then test to ensure proper enforcement.
